messages.message: I've been noticing seemingly random 502 gateway errors in some places we use cy.request - for example, when polling project deletion jobs. It's especially bad when it happens in a before hook because it just fails the whole test without retrying. I'm going to add retries in some of those spots.
we’ve been discussing these 502 errors here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1717566269353069)!
this has been a major problem in CI over the past few days
Do you think it would still be useful to add in the retries since we still haven't gotten to the bottom of it?

we could try adding retries, but the error has also occurred for api calls made by the frontend, not a cypress test

those are the majority of the cases i’ve seen with the 502 errors
